mapper.select: select id,type,func_get_dicvalue(type,'GLXXXTLX') typeShow,func_get_dicvalue(PARTICULAR_YEAR,'ND') year,system_name,sources,func_get_dicvalue(sources,'GLXXXTLY') sourcesShow,unit_name,creator,create_time,create_dept,changer,change_time,change_dept,valid_flag from T_TAB_MANAGEMENT_INFORMATION where 1=1 AND PARTICULAR_YEAR like '${year}'
mapper.update: update t_tab_management_information set type=#{type},system_name=#{systemName},sources=#{sources},particular_year=#{year},unit_name=#{unitName},changer=#{changer},change_time= sysdate,change_dept=#{changeDept} where id = #{id}
